#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,k,i,r;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
              cin>>n>>k;
              long long int r=1;
              if(n-k<k)k=n-k;
              for(i=0;i<k;)
              {
                           r=r*n--;
                           r=r/++i;
              }
              cout<<r<<"\n";
    }
}
